p: A 12‐lead ECG showed a clear ST elevation in the inferior leads and V4–V6, and an ST depression in aVL and V1–V2 (Figure 2b); Echocardiography quickly performed confirmed the ST‐elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI) diagnosis showing akinesia of the infero‐posterolateral wall with an estimated LVEF of 40%.
